H0.text: Haematite is an ore of which metal. Copper

H1.text: Haematite is an ore of which metal. Titanium

H2.text: Haematite is an ore of which metal. Manganese

H3.text: Haematite is an ore of which metal. Iron

A4.text: An important class is the iron oxide minerals such as hematite (Fe2O3), magnetite (Fe3O4), and siderite (FeCO3), which are the major ores of iron.
